extendedInfo.description: ******ATTENTION******Adjust the âTOUCH SENSITIVITYâ if you feel the flick is too weak or too strong.âRollerâ is a Skee-Ball style game. The classic arcade game is on your Android device now!Swipe your finger to roll the ball into different holes with designated points. High res 3d graphics and quality physics will make the ball move, roll and bounce with great realism. This game is easy to play and fall in love with. Youâll feel right back to your childhood.3 different skins for the machine. 6 different balls. You can choose the one you like in "Customize" menu.Tips:Aim is achieved by carefully controlling the start and stop points of the flick, the direction and speed between them.You can also add spin after the ball is released by tilting.Not support Xoom yet. Try the lite version before you buy it

reviews.title: Seriously!?
reviews.comment: You\'ve got to be kidding me. This game is EXACTLY like the free version. But now you\'re gonna add advertisement!? I hope this company runs out of business.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No workie on nexus 7
reviews.comment: Wow I bought this and it never even worked on my nexus 7. I hit play game and it crashes when zooming out at the beginning. Awful app... How do I get a refund? Oh well hopefully the creator fixes it
reviews.author: Cameron Perry

reviews.title: Nostalgic.
reviews.comment: Looks like the dev removed the ads? I installed the game again today, played about 6 rounds and didn\'t see any ads! Awesome. Glad to have this back on my tablet, reminds me of visiting Chuckee Cheese as a kid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forcecloses all the time
reviews.comment: Not sure what happened but I can\'t play the game any more. Its constantly foreclosing and freezing in the middle of s game. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Brian Fallon

reviews.title: Good But?
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but needs some improvements like earning tickets for prizes and new tables skins and different balls and the sensitivity fixed just acts the same all the way up as it does all the way down... Till then looking for a different skee ball game...  Sorry don\'t waist you\'re money
reviews.author: Keith Blest

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work at all.  EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads seem to be gone if...
reviews.comment: you Uninstall Roller first, then install the update, (not just hitting \'update\' without installing first.)

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Nexus 7. Auto closes on open.

reviews.title: Damnit
reviews.comment: This game sucks so bad it doesn\'t work at all...0 stars from me I had to give it 1 just to post and I cant believe i bought it!

reviews.comment: This game  sucks, sorry I wasted time and space downloading it!

reviews.title: Update: JB SGS3 not working

reviews.title: Roller
reviews.comment: This game won\'t let any balls go in the pocket except for 10. Doesnt matter how much the sensitivity is adjusted. Nice idea but wouldn\'t recommend buying.

reviews.comment: Working on galaxy s4

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This game is so addicting! I\'m getting better at it, but it never gets old to me! Love it! Worth the money!

reviews.comment: Is this 1 of those \"spamming\" sites-got game around noon&keep doing send report / for ced close thing til sent 1-then I could play!!!

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: UI is choppy and the ball moves around more then it should. IPhone version is 10x better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: Pretty good although not many levels choices for skins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but repetitive
reviews.comment: The game is fun but it is too easy to get well over 1k, just got 1500 without even trying. Would be nice if there were varied layouts or something to change up the gameplay every once in a while.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a great game, At Times its challenging or frustrating but it was too easy would be boring
reviews.author: A Google User
